title: Ojamajo Doremi Dokkaan!

alternative_titles.ja: おジャ魔女どれみドッカ〜ン！

synopsis: Hana-chan has somehow become a peer of the Ojamajo. With Majo Tourbillion's spirit starting to run rampant and cause more problems in the Witch World, Doremi and the others are tasked with breaking her curse once and for all. Along with help from a special elephant, Pao-chan, Doremi, Hana and the Ojamajo must find a way to stop the curse and free Majo Tourbillion from her suffering.
